message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1,300,000 price point. I would like to propose an alternative at $1,000,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to negotiate, but $1,000,000 is significantly below my minimum.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,175,000? This price reflects the true value of the product while hopefully accommodating your budget.
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to increase my offer to $1,100,000. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable.
